short_summary: Janitorial services for RCMP Fort Qu'Apelle Detachment
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires all labour, materials, equipment, transportation and daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial services
full_summary:
Tender Information
================

**Title (English / French)**
------------------------

Janitorial Services - RCMP Fort Qu'Appelle Detachment
 Services de nettoyage - Détachement de la GRC de Fort Qu'Appelle

**Reference / Nuéro de Soumission**
--------------------------------

CB-753-64461774

**Tender Identification**
-------------------------

* Category: SRV (Service)
* Type: Request for Proposal (RP)
* Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Status: Expired

**Description (English / French)**
--------------------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bidders to provide janitorial services to the RCMP Fort Qu'Appelle Detachment, located in Fort Qu'Appelle, Saskatchewan. The scope of work includes labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision for a period of two years, with an option to extend for an additional three years.

**Key Details**
----------------

* Cleaning services are required five days a week.
* The contract period is two years, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.
* This tender will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more Indigenous businesses submit compliant bids.
* A site visit is available upon request.

**Security and Evaluation**
---------------------------

* This solicitation contains a security requirement.
* Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest evaluated price.

**Submission and Contact Information**
---------------------------------------

* Submissions must be made to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit.
* Contact information for Debbie McPherson, Senior Contract Specialist, can be found below:

Debbie McPherson
Senior Contract Specialist
Royal Canadian Mounted Police
5600 11 Avenue
Regina, SK S4P 3J7
Phone: 1-639-625-3567
Email: Debbie.McPherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Attachments and Additional Information**
--------------------------------------------

The tender documents, including the Invitation to Tender and Annex "A" - Janitorial Services, can be downloaded on the Canada Buys website.

This tender requires suppliers to be familiar with Canadian laws and regulations, particularly those related to security and confidentiality.

The Government of Canada seeks the best value for taxpayers' dollars and encourages suppliers to provide innovative solutions that meet the needs of the RCMP and the Government of Canada.  [^1]

[^1]: Please note that this is a key
